Using ''nie'' is only possible if such a period of time is (unusually) long, as in the example sentence above. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|never at all}} {{l|de|niemals}}, {{l|de|nimmer}} {{qualifier|archaic}} * {{sense|not once}} {{l|de|nicht}}, {{l|de|gar}} nicht, {{l|de|überhaupt}} nicht ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|nie und nimmer}} ===See also=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
